alert.note: Alert for San Juan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 26 at 6:03AM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow continued. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills continued. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...San Juan County, including Stuart Island, Waldron Island, Orcas Island, San Juan Island, Lopez Island, Blakely Island, and Decatur Island. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.
